Package com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.directory

Class DirectorySource<S extends MessageSource<?>>

java.lang.Object
com.github.siroshun09.messages.api.directory.DirectorySource<S>
Type Parameters:
S - the type of the MessageSources.
public final class DirectorySource<S extends MessageSource<?>> extends Object
A class for loading MessageSources from the directory.
